name: Customer Addresses and Contacts
query:
-- Spectrum Fruits Custom

SELECT
	`tabCustomer`.name 			AS customer_id,
	`tabCustomer`.customer_name,
	`tabCustomer`.customer_group,
	`tabAddress`.address_line1,
	`tabAddress`.address_line2,
	`tabAddress`.city,
	`tabAddress`.state,
	`tabAddress`.pincode,
	`tabAddress`.country,
	`tabAddress`.is_primary_address, 
	`tabContact`.first_name,
	`tabContact`.last_name,
	`tabContact`.phone,
	`tabContact`.mobile_no,
	`tabContact`.email_id,
	`tabContact`.is_primary_contact
FROM
	`tabCustomer`

	LEFT JOIN	-- SELECT * FROM 
		`tabDynamic Link`		AS AddressLink
	ON
		AddressLink.link_doctype = 'Customer'
	AND AddressLink.link_name = tabCustomer.name
	AND AddressLink.parenttype = 'Address'
	
	LEFT JOIN
		`tabAddress`
	ON 
		`tabAddress`.name = AddressLink.parent

	LEFT JOIN	-- SELECT * FROM 
		`tabDynamic Link`		AS ContactLink
	ON
		ContactLink.link_doctype = 'Customer'
	AND ContactLink.link_name = tabCustomer.name
	AND ContactLink.parenttype = 'Contact'
	
	LEFT JOIN
		`tabContact`
	ON 
		`tabContact`.name = ContactLink.parent
		
WHERE
	`tabCustomer`.docstatus < 2  -- not cancelled

ORDER BY
	`tabCustomer`.name asc
